Name: Halod's adventure times
About the game: Hero Haload received a request for beating the king of monsters, but there are Five of them! How does Haload complete the quest, and what will happen on his journey? You will play Haload adventure in this world most of the time there is no need to fight, you can fully enjoy the plot to solve puzzles and mini-games in the game FEATURE Battling demon lords in a fantasy world Advancing the plot through exploration and puzzle solving Include mini game with a shooting and maze genre OTHER About This Game This game is a co-work creation, by several members of RPGMaker-Games Discord Group. It is an event for every joined creator, to practice a short chapter work in one day (maybe a few hours), pass to the other member, and a chance for newbies to learn. It became an everyday soap opera which amuse group members. We wish this game can be an activator for the 2023 RPG Maker Game Design Contest, encouraging more RM creators to join us.
